title: Inkas’ armored GMC Savana is the bulletproof passenger van you’ve always wanted
text: Inkas’ armored GMC Savana is the bulletproof passenger van you’ve always wanted Wednesday, 2 September 2015 (11 minutes ago) Canadian armored vehicle manufacturer Inkas is most famous for its bulletproof SUVs, but the company’s catalog is more diverse that you might think. For proof, check out the brand’s tough and luxurious GMC Savana passenger van.
